name: Tappy Cube Crush
description:
Tappy Cube Crush is a simple block crushing game. The game features colorful lines of cube which keep moving upwards and you have to crush the cubes so that they don't hit the top.

You can tap on the cubes to destroy them. Min of 2 cubes with same color should be adjacent to each other to be destroyed. a single cube can not be destroyed.

Some special power ups can also popup with the cubes which you can crush to use those powers.

Some of those power ups include stopping the new bricks from popping up, which is time stop. Another one can destroy all the blocks of same color in the rows and columns. A bomb powerup will destroy adjacent bricks from each side no matter what the color is. And one powerup will destroy a line below it.
